sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词或副词词组均有"立刻，马上"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: immediately, instantly, presently, directly, shortly, soon, at once, right away
means: immediately ： 指做完一件事后，立即就做另一件事，中间一般没有明显的时间间隔。
instantly ： 指恰恰就在此刻，一秒钟也没耽误。
shortly和soon同义，指动作发生或完成的速度之快。
soon ： 常用词，指行动快，完成速度快。
at once ： 口语中常用，语气强烈，指时间紧迫，一刻也不能耽误。
right away ： 主要用于美国英语，语气稍弱于at once，强调动作迅速。

sentence.Network_en: The agreement has raised hopes that the war may end soon.
sentence.Network_cn: 那项协议使人们感到战争有望很快结束。

sentence.Network_en: As soon as he got inside, the dog shook himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一进来，狗就开始摇头摆尾。

sentence.Network_en: He will soon be back in training for next year's National.
sentence.Network_cn: 他将很快回来为明年的全国联赛进行特训。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 人教版七年级上册英语单词表 ... me pron. 我（I的宾格） soon adv. 不久 wish n. 希望；祝愿.
...质量限制时，它将塌陷成为。但是，在与科学美国人的Sion博士联系后，他说天文学上在新闻发布中所谓的“很快(soon)“，意味着“我们推导出罗盘座 T的白矮星，还要上百万甚至上千万年才会达到钱卓极限“，介时他已远离太阳.
your wound will soon close up ., 你的伤口很快就会愈合.

jx.jx_en_mean: used to convey that the second event mentioned happens immediately after the first

lj.lj_ly: she had no sooner spoken than the telephone rang.
lj.lj_ls: 她刚一说话，电话就响了。

jx.jx_en_mean: before much time has gone by

lj.lj_ly: I would be grateful if you would come to your senses sooner rather than later.
lj.lj_ls: 你要是能早点恢复理智我就谢天谢地了。

lj.lj_ly: No sooner was the frost off the ground than the work began.
lj.lj_ls: 地上的霜一消散，人们就开始工作了

lj.lj_ly: Sooner or later you will have to face the facts.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English sōna 'immediately', of West Germanic origin

encyclopedia.content: 解释 音标 英音：[su:n]美音：[sun] 词典解释 副词ad. 1.不久，很快地 It will soonbe Christmas. 圣诞节很快就要到了。 2.快，早 She didn't finish her homework as soon as she had expected. 她的作业没有她预料的那样快完成。 3.宁可，宁愿，宁肯 I would as soonyou didn't tell me about that. 我宁可你不告诉我那件事。同义词 shortly adv. 立刻， 马上 presently adv. 不久， 一会。..quickly adv. 迅速地， 立刻 before

entry.def: If something is going to happen soon, it will happen after a short time. If something happened soon after a particular time or event, it happened a short time after it.

example.ex: You'll be hearing from us very soon...
example.tran: 你很快就会收到我们的来信。

example.ex: This chance has come sooner than I expected...
example.tran: 这个机会来得比我预想的要快。

entry.def: If you say that something happens as soon as something else happens, you mean that it happens immediately after the other thing.

example.ex: As soon as relations improve they will be allowed to go...
example.tran: 一旦关系有所改善，他们就可以获准离开。

example.ex: You'll never guess what happened as soon as I left my room.
example.tran: 你怎么也猜不出我一离开房间就发生了什么事。

entry.def: If you say that you would just as soon do something or you'd just as soon do it, you mean that you would prefer to do it.

example.ex: These people could afford to retire to Florida but they'd just as soon stay put...
example.tran: 这些人有足够的钱可以去佛罗里达安度退休生活，可是他们却宁愿留在原来的地方。

example.ex: I'd just as soon not have to make this public...
example.tran: 我宁愿不必将此事公之于众。

auth_sentence.content: BBC World News will soon be available in Burma.
auth_sentence.res_content: BBC World News will soon be available in Burma.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: BBC World News will soon be available in Burma.

auth_sentence.content: He soon realised when a wave crashed over him.
auth_sentence.res_content: He soon realised when a wave crashed over him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He soon realised when a wave crashed over him.

auth_sentence.content: Pretty soon it gained popularity and became big business.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pretty soon it gained popularity and became big business.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pretty soon it gained popularity and became big business.

Sentence.sentence: The greater the difference, the sooner and more thoroughly the new technology replaces the old.
They should finish the work as soon as possible.
How soon do you think this can be cleaned?
iPhones and iPods will replace laptops sooner or later
It will see a rebound sooner or later
However, soon after these fierce outbreaks, the virus died out, at least temporarily.

means.word_mean: 不久; 即刻, 马上

sentences.en: We reached the station an hour too soon.
I'd sooner die than marry you!
